    允许自己偶尔做一个自由而无用的灵魂。

    Project maintained by guanyizhao Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

    Where to get help

    If you think you’ve found a bug in The Midnight Theme, please check the existing issues, and if no one has reported the problem, open a new issue.

    If you have a general question about the theme, how to implement it, or how to customize it for your site you have two options:

    1. Contact GitHub Support, or

    2. Ask your question of the Jekyll community on talk.jekyllrb.com
